Patent Information.Abstract: Antimicrobial peptides and methods of use are provided.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.20308076] Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=25 μM); Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC>200 μM); Escherichia coli D21(MIC=100 μM); Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC=30 μM); Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC>200 μM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=12.5 μM); E. faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=50 μM); Bacillus megaterium(MIC=3 μM);Yeasts:Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=50 μM); C. parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=50 μM); S. cerevisiae(MIC=12.5 μM);Fungus(MIC>200 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.20308076] Temporin-SHf is not cytotoxic against human erythrocytes (LC50 = 200 μm), with a hemolytic activity detected only at peptide concentration far above the MIC values determined for the sensitive strains (3–50 μm)
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Once bound parallel to the microbial membrane surface, it folds into a non-amphipathic hydrophobic
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-negative bacteria (Escherichia coli ATCC 25922, Escherichia coli ATCC 35218, Escherichia coli D21, Escherichia coli ML-35p, Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853) and Gram-positive bacteria (Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923, E. faecalis ATCC 29212, Bacillus megaterium. Antifungal activity)

Literature.Title: Temporin-SHf, a new type of phe-rich and hydrophobic ultrashort antimicrobial peptide.
Literature.Author: Abbassi F, Lequin O, Piesse C, Goasdou
